name: Red Curry Paste
recipeIngredient: 1 tbsp coriander seeds, roasted until brown
10 big dried red chilies, seeds removed and soaked in water for at least 10 minutes and then finely chopped
2 tsp lemongrass, lower third only, chopped
10 small fresh red chili peppers (prik kee noo)
recipeInstructions: Put the coriander seeds, cardamon pods and black peppercorns in a granite mortar and grind into a powder with a pestle. Add the rest of the ingredients and pound using a pestle for about 10 minutes until the paste is smooth. All the ingredients for the paste can also be put into a blender and liquidized. If the paste is too dry, you may need to add a bit of water.
